meanings.definition: Somewhat slow in speed or pace.
meanings.sent1: The turtle moved at a slowish pace across the yard.
meanings.sent2: The snail is known for its slowish movements.
meanings.sent3: The sloth challenged the cheetah to a race, feeling confident in its slowish abilities.
meanings.sent4: The traffic on the highway was slowish, resembling a line of ants crawling along.
meanings.sent5: The old car chugged along the road at a slowish speed, barely making it up the hill.
